doc.field: This collection contains several monthly issues of from the years 1988 and 1989, occurring in chronological order and housed in one manuscript box. 1988 issues are from January, May, July/August, October, and November, while 1989 issues are from February, March, July/August, September, and October. Issues dating from July/August 1989 forward feature the title on their cover pages.

This collection contains several monthly issues of from the years 1988 and 1989, occurring in chronological order and housed in one manuscript box. 1988 issues are from January, May, July/August, October, and November, while 1989 issues are from February, March, July/August, September, and October. Issues dating from July/August 1989 forward feature the title on their cover pages.

This collection contains several monthly issues of BQE Magazine from the years 1988 and 1989, occurring in chronological order and housed in one manuscript box. 1988 issues are from January, May, July/August, October, and November, while 1989 issues are from February, March, July/August, September, and October. Issues dating from July/August 1989 forward feature the title The Brooklyn Queens Monthly on their cover pages.

BQE Magazine, later known as The Brooklyn Queens Monthly, was a periodical published by BQE Magazine, Inc. The magazine was advertised as an alternative news source for Brooklyn and Queens residents whose interests lied outside the mainstream culture associated with Manhattan. Articles and features related to fashion, arts and culture, dining, nightlife, and politics. Profiles of various Brooklyn and Queens neighborhoods were also included.
Source and date of acquisition unknown.
